document_data.name: ''Deathwyrm Cloak''
document_data.mainbody: e cloak was long, black, and scaly.
document_data.Description: The cloak was long, black, and scaly.
document_data.Powers: The ''deathwyrm cloaks'' offered some protection from raw magical force damage, but mainly improved the power of the wearer's [[negative energy]] spells and increased the effect of negative energy upon themselves, making them useful for those that regenerated with negative energy like the [[undead]] and [[pale master]] [[necromancer]]s.
document_data.History: The Cult of the Dragon forces that followed [[Aurgloroasa]] in [[Thunderholme]] used a number of these cloaks in the 1480s [[DR]].
